Text: although they have a pretty big back catalogue, this album is probably their best one, it certainly got them noticed in the uk, not a bad track on it, if youve not heard them, then go for this, its simply a fantastic record. many thanx ..

Hmm...I agree, a great album without a doubt.  Definitely straightforward, in terms of x amount of rock numbers in a row, differing the album from the more concept-oriented ones.  These tend to be my favs overall - Going For The One, Tales From Topographic Oceans, Relayer.  

What do you think of those?
Peace...and glad you like the tunes!
J
